AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 18/12725/FUL (Erection of rear roof extensions to No's. 16 and 18 Bellevue Road) for installation of 2no. rear rooflights.
decision_conditions: The authorised use for the ground floor of the premises is a restaurant (Class A3) which has already commenced. It is not retail, a betting office or a pay day loan shop or a casino and as such the site cannot benefit form the provisions set out under Schedule 2, Part 3, Class C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.The applicant has also failed to demonstrate, on the balance of probabilities, that the replacement flue would not constitute building operations or other operations as defined within s55 1(A) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
Please provide information regarding the  amount by which you seek to reduce each tree by  (T.3)
